name: Flail.io
description:
Do you hear the drums of war? Soldiers, gladiators, peasants, criminals... all are answering the call of the emperor for a standoff at the arena! Even pandas are- wait, pandas?

Uh... we apparently have some problems with our contestants. Makes no difference, anyone who has the courage to face others and prove their strength and strategy skills are more than welcome to our tournament: FLAIL.IO!

Flail.IO is a competitive game where you face other competitors, using your magical, majestic flail. It relies on pure strategy making, advanced prediction skills and the ability to SWING IT like a boss. Throw it towards your enemies to kill them and BATHE IN THEIR BLO-life juices. We totally meant life juices.

Our contestants are fierce and deadly. A panda, a vampire... we even have a guy made of stone! That's ten thousand times stronger than pebbles and armor, y'all! Oh, we also have a zombie that we resurrected from a dark ritual as warlocks... but he decided to fight on the arena for glory.

For those who venture far beyond to the abyss, it will gaze back into you!

Challenges await the brave and bold... a little bit of recklessness is required as well. Survive long nights, kill a thousand gladiators, and attract new warriors to your collection of skins!

Features:
* Crush your opponents with a flail!
* Throw it towards those who are afraid of challenging you!
* Unlock a total of 20 different skins to flaunt your style!
* Find the secret item of valor!

Liked our game? Support us by CRUSHING MORE ENEMIES HEADS IN WITH YOUR FLAIL! Or you can just rate us with 5 stars and a review...

For your questions, suggestions, or dark arts initiation package registration, please reach us at support@warlockarts.com
publishers: Warlock Arts Yazilim Sanayi ve Ticaret Limited Sirketi
